item.title: Page Layouts
item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded:
Not every page in your blogsite is the same - so why is every layout? Genesis is awesome in that it allows you to select one of six layouts for every page you create  - viva choice! Take a look at the variety of ways you can style a page...by simply clicking a button!
  • Content/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Content
  • Content/Sidebar/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Sidebar/Content
  • Sidebar/Content/Sidebar
  • Full Width Content

item.title: Contact Page
item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded: [gravityform id=1 title=false description=true]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded:
Bee Crafty is a child theme built by Creativity Included for the StudioPress Genesis Framework. This theme is perfect for businesses who put more emphasis on images than they do words. Featuring a cool jQuery home page, six page layout options, custom widgets and galleries, and Chris's signature attention to detail, Bee Crafty is is the perfect way to build your WordPress-powered blog-site.
About the Genesis Theme Framework
The Genesis Theme Framework is built on a simple blog-type parent theme, and can be extended with child themes like this one. Each child theme comes with a unique look, feel, homepage and functions file. We’ve also built some custom widgets that will make adding content much easier on the user.
About the Designer
Creativity Included is a woman-owned and focused design studio specializing in creating commercial WordPress themes using the Genesis framework. We especially love working with women building their own businesses, so many of our designs  have a decidedly more feminine flavor than the average theme.

item.title: Recommended Plug-Ins
item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded:
During our time customizing themes for photographers, scrapbookers and other creative small businesses, we've discovered a variety of plug-ins that make your life easier and make your site prettier. Bee Crafty will work just fine without them, but if you really want to take things to the next level download, install and activate them:
Typekit
This is not a plug in so much as it is a hosted web font service. Licenses range from free for fonts in the trial library to $40 for the professional library. That's what makes the type look so sweet in the demo.
Gravity Forms
Best form plugin you'll ever use. Period.

item.title: About the Type
item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded:
Bee Crafty is Typekit ready, which means it's finally easy, fast and legal to use high-quality typography on yourwebsite.
With just a few clicks you can be rocking any font in the Typekit library you've chosen to use (licensing fees range from free for the trial library to $50/year for the complete library). Why settle for Georgia or Verdana when you can choose from foundries like Veer, P22 or Typodermic? Use the ones we've suggested, or choose a unique typeface that fits your brand and budget -- it's easy to do. Click here to read more about the fonts featured in the Bee Crafty demo.

item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded:
Family Tree is a child theme built by Creativity Included for the StudioPress Genesis Framework. This theme is perfect for someone who wants to install a theme with a more feminine touch. Featuring custom widgets, six layout options and Chris’s signature attention to detail, Family Tree is is the perfect way to build your WordPress-powered blogsite. About the Genesis Theme Framework The Genesis Theme Framework is built on a simple blog-type parent theme, and can be extended with child themes like this one. Each child theme comes with a unique look, feel, homepage and functions file. We’ve also built some custom widgets that will make adding content much easier on the user. Here’s a List of Custom Widgets Included with the Theme Recent Tweets | displays your latest Tweets
User Profile | displays avatar, bio and link to about page
eNews & Updates | opt-in for delivery of posts by email
Featured Posts | displays post excerpt and thumbnail
Featured Page | displays page excerpt and thumbnail
Creativity Included is a woman-owned and focused design studio specializing in brand identity, logo design, stationery design and WordPress theme customizations using the Genesis framework. We love working with women building their own businesses, and specialize in finding out what makes you unique and turning it into a brand. If you would like to discuss a potential project, please contact us and we’ll send you a price list!

item.dc:creator: Chris Ford
item.content:encoded:
Not every page in your blogsite is the same – so why is every layout? Genesis is awesome in that it allows you to select one of six layouts for every page you create – viva choice! Take a look at the variety of ways you can style a page…by simply clicking a button!
Content/Sidebar Sidebar/Content Content/Sidebar/Sidebar Sidebar/Sidebar/Content Sidebar/Content/Sidebar Full Width Content
